Token.Abstract: ### Summary
The corresponding local property for id.
The corresponding local property for id.
The most recent dictionary of all properties returned by Rails, exactly as it returned it. (read-only)
The most recent dictionary of all properties returned by Rails, exactly as it returned it. (read-only)
If true, will remotely destroy this object if sent nested.
If true, will remotely destroy this object if sent nested.
Returns an array of all remote objects (as instances of receiver's class.) Each instance’s properties will be set to those returned by Rails.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: NSArray of instances of receiver's class. Each object’s properties will be set to those returned by Rails.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves an array of all remote objects (as instances of receiver's class.) Each instance’s properties will be set to those returned by Rails.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Returns an instance of receiver's class corresponding to the remote object with that ID.

Parameter.Name: objectID
Parameter.Abstract: The ID of the remote object.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Instance of receiver's class with properties from the remote object with that ID.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves an instance receiver's class corresponding to the remote object with that ID.

Parameter.Name: objectID
Parameter.Abstract: The ID of the remote object.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Returns the JSON response for a GET request to a custom method.

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Custom REST method to be called on the subclass's controller. If nil, will route to index.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: JSON response object (could be an NSArray or NSDictionary).

Token.Abstract: Makes a GET request to a custom method.

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Custom REST method to be called on the subclass's controller. If nil, will route to index.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Returns the JSON response for a request with a custom method, sending an NSRRemoteObject subclass instance as the body.

Parameter.Name: httpVerb
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Custom REST method to be called on the subclass's controller. If nil, will route to index.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: NSRRemoteObject subclass instance - object you want to send in the body.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: JSON response object (could be an NSArray or NSDictionary).

Token.Abstract: Makes a request with a custom method, sending an NSRRemoteObject subclass instance as the body.

Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: NSRRemoteObject subclass instance - object you want to send in the body.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Returns the JSON response for a request with a custom method.

Parameter.Name: httpVerb
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: The REST method to call (appended to the route). If nil, will call index. See above for examples.

Parameter.Name: body
Parameter.Abstract: Request body (needs to be a JSON parsable object, or will throw exception (NSDictionary, NSArray)).

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: JSON response object (could be an NSArray or NSDictionary).

Token.Abstract: Makes a request with a custom method.

Parameter.Name: httpVerb
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: The REST method to call (appended to the route). If nil, will call index. See above for examples.

Parameter.Name: body
Parameter.Abstract: Request body (needs to be a JSON parsable object, or will throw exception (NSDictionary, NSArray)).

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the latest remote data for receiver and sets its properties to received response.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if fetch was successful. Returns NO if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the latest remote data for receiver and sets its properties to received response.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

Parameter.Name: changesPtr
Parameter.Abstract:
Pointer to boolean value set to whether or not the receiver changed in any way after the fetch (ie, if this fetch modified one of receiver's local properties due to a change in value server-side). This will also take into account diffs to any nested NSRRemoteObject objects that are affected by this fetch (done recursively).
Note that because this only tracks differences in local changes, properties that changed server-side that are not defined in the receiver's class will not report back a change (ie, if receiver's class doesn't implement an updatedat property and updatedat is changed in your remote DB, no change will be reported.) This parameter may be NULL if this information is not useful, or use remoteFetch:.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if fetch was successful. Returns NO if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the latest remote data for receiver and sets its properties to received response.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete. The second parameter passed in is a BOOL whether or not there was a local change. This means changes in updated_at, etc, will only apply if your Objective-C class implement this as a property as well. This also applies when updating any of its nested objects (done recursively).

Token.Abstract: Updates receiver's corresponding remote object.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if update was successful. Returns NO if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Updates receiver's corresponding remote object.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Creates the receiver remotely. Receiver's properties will be set to those given by Rails (including remoteID.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if create was successful. Returns NO if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Creates the receiver remotely. Receiver's properties will be set to those given by Rails (including remoteID.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Destroys receiver's corresponding remote object. Local object will be unaffected.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if destroy was successful. Returns NO if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Destroys receiver's corresponding remote object. Local object will be unaffected.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Returns the JSON response for a GET request to a custom method.

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Custom REST method to be called on the remote object corresponding to the receiver. If nil, will route to only the receiver (objects/1).

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: JSON response object (could be an NSArray or NSDictionary).

Token.Abstract: Makes a GET request to a custom method.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Parameter.Abstract: Custom REST method to be called on the remote object corresponding to the receiver. If nil, will route to only the receiver (objects/1).

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: JSON response object (could be an NSArray or NSDictionary).

Parameter.Name: httpVerb
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

Parameter.Abstract: The REST method to call (appended to the route). If nil, will call index. See above for examples.

Token.Abstract: Makes a request with a custom method on the receiver's corresponding remote object.

Parameter.Name: httpVerb
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

Parameter.Name: customRESTMethod
Parameter.Abstract: The REST method to call (appended to the route). If nil, will call index. See above for examples.

Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.

Token.Abstract: Serializes the receiver's properties into a dictionary.

Parameter.Name: wrapped
Parameter.Abstract:
If YES, wraps the dictionary with a key of the model name:
{"user"=>{"name"=>"x", "email"=>"y"}}

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver's properties as a dictionary (takes into account rules in NSRMap).

Token.Abstract: Sets the receiver's properties given a dictionary.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: Dictionary to be evaluated.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if any changes were made to the local object, NO if object was identical before/after.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new instance of the receiver's class with a given dictionary input.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: Dictionary to be evaluated.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if any changes were made to the local object, NO if object was identical before/after.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new instance of the receiver's class with a custom NSRMap string.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: String to become this instance's NSRMap - pass as you would an NSRMap string (see above).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if any changes were made to the local object, NO if object was identical before/after.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new instance of the receiver's class with a custom NSRMap string and config.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: String to become this instance's NSRMap - pass as you would an NSRMap string (see above).

Parameter.Name: config
Parameter.Abstract: Config to become this instance's config.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if any changes were made to the local object, NO if object was identical before/after.
